meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Committee on General Investigating and Ethics
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor at City Hall and via videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the May 4, 2023, Ad Hoc Committee on General Investigating and Ethics.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of City Actions Related to 7800 N. Stemmons Freeway
agenda_items.description: Discussion of all City actions related to 7800 N. Stemmons Freeway from consideration of purchase to present day, including a detailed briefing by staff regarding the timeline, costs, and responsibilities associated with acquisition and occupancy.

agenda_items.title: Request for Audit or Investigation
agenda_items.description: Consider requesting the Office of the City Auditor to conduct or facilitate a limited-scope audit or investigation of the Cityâ€™s due diligence process for the purchase of the 7800 N. Stemmons Freeway office building and subsequent improvements, inspections, and permitting activities completed before the decision to start moving employees into the building, including comparing the practices observed to industry practices.
